column4: hi,  i really need help with this - http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=364360
can i quickly check that any windows exe programs installed through win will appear in the applications folder?
how do i open an installed wine software?
If it doesn't appear in the wine submenu in your menu, if you have one, you'll have to 'cd' to wine's directory. cd ~/.wine/drive_c and look for it in there.
